duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs Help Desk duties including maintenance activities, equipment inventory, trouble reports and calls to vendors
Assists in identifying, researching and resolving system software, database, hardware and/or network problems
Installs, maintains, and troubleshoots computer and server equipment.
Installs, maintains, diagnoses and repairs network, and phone line problems.

Assists in assessing and preparing facilities for installation of network components, including the assembly of cable and connectors to meet the specifications of vendor interfaces and configuration of hardware to ensure compatibility with network configuration.
Setup and troubleshoot Android, Apple OS mobile devices
Maintains, and troubleshoots problems with in-car camera systems and mobile broadband devices.
Research and planning of new technology or upgrades.
Maintain inventory of equipment and supplies. Insuring all computer assets are properly asset tagged for compliance.
Perform other duties as assigned both in office and on site.
